attributes.action: Deselect Tory MPs who defied the government in the Brexit Withdrawal Bill vote.
attributes.background: Eleven Tory MPs defied the whips to vote down a government amendment. Since the rebel MPs are all diehard anti-Brexit campaigners, their motives are surely to defy the will of the people in seeking to derail the Brexit process.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the Conservative party, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
